channel.title: Dragon Claws; req's
channel.description: Just 1 simple question, I couldn't figure out myself. How do I change the 60 defence requirement of Dragon Claws to 1 defence? Thank you, for reading and (I hope) answering my question.

item.title: Dragon Claws; req's
item.dc:creator: @spy_man47 spy man47
item.description:
@spy_man47 wrote:

Go to client.java and search for :

f(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 13664 && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtk(true, 25, 252, 2068); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; getHit(10); usingSpecial = true; specialAmount -= 50; }

Replace With :

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 13664 && specialAmount > 24 && playerLevel[playerDefence] == 1 ){ specialAtk(true, 25, 252, 2068); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; getHit(10); usingSpecial = true; specialAmount -= 50; }

Idk if it will work, but try (:

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon Claws; req's
item.dc:creator: @illslayu illslayu
item.description:
@illslayu wrote:

If you could find names such as “Scimitar” or “Longsword” (Or any other kind of weapons) Then copy that line or maybe a few lines and replace that weap name with claws so the server knows that “Claws” are a weapon and won’t require defence.

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon Claws; req's
item.dc:creator: @Mental_Piracy Mental Piracy
item.description:
@Mental_Piracy wrote:

} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon") && !ItemName.endsWith("claws")) { return 60; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon claws")) { return 1;

Also since you are working with item reqs i advise you to redo all of deltas reqs. Using names for the requirements is buggy as hell, best to just use an array

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon Claws; req's
item.dc:creator: @pur3str_pk2 pur3str pk2
item.description:
@pur3str_pk2 wrote:

Didn’t help. Anyone else got a solution?
Thanks anyways deathschaos.

item.title: Dragon Claws; req's
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Wearing.java, find this line

} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon")) { return 60;

And replace it with this

} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon")) { return 60; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon claws")) { return 1;

Read full topic
